Package io.github.thepieterdc.http

Interface HttpClient

public interface HttpClient
Sends HTTP calls.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    HttpClient
    authenticate(String apiToken)
    Sets the api token to include in every request.
    <T> HttpResponse<T>
    get(String url, Class<T> returnCls)
    Performs a HTTP GET request to the given url.
    <R, T> HttpResponse<T>
    post(String url, R body, Class<T> returnCls)
    Performs a HTTP POST request to the given url.
    HttpClient
    userAgent(String userAgent)
    Sets the user agent.

  • Method Details

    • authenticate

      @Nonnull HttpClient authenticate(String apiToken)
      Sets the api token to include in every request.
      Parameters:
      apiToken - the api token
      Returns:
      fluent setter

    • get

      @Nonnull <T> HttpResponse<T> get(String url, Class<T> returnCls)
      Performs a HTTP GET request to the given url.
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of the response
      Parameters:
      url - the url to call
      returnCls - the class of the response
      Returns:
      the response parsed as T

    • post

      @Nonnull <R, T> HttpResponse<T> post(String url, R body, Class<T> returnCls)
      Performs a HTTP POST request to the given url.
      Type Parameters:
      R - type of the request body
      T - type of the response
      Parameters:
      url - the url to call
      body - the post body
      returnCls - the class of the response
      Returns:
      the response parsed as T

    • userAgent

      @Nonnull HttpClient userAgent(String userAgent)
      Sets the user agent.
      Parameters:
      userAgent - the user agent to set
      Returns:
      fluent setter
